properties.name: externalId
properties.description: The field to check to see if the account already exists. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: externalIdValue
properties.description: If this value exists in the 'match against' field, update the account. Otherwise create a new one.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the account. Maximum size is 255 characters.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Account number assigned to this account (not the unique ID). Maximum size is 40 characters.

properties.name: annualRevenue
properties.description: Estimated annual revenue of the account

properties.name: accountSource
properties.description: The source of the account record. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: billingCity
properties.description: Details for the billing address of this account. Maximum size is 40 characters.

properties.name: billingCountry
properties.description: Details for the billing address of this account. Maximum size is 80 characters.

properties.name: billingPostalCode
properties.description: Details for the billing address of this account. Maximum size is 20 characters.

properties.name: billingState
properties.description: Details for the billing address of this account. Maximum size is 80 characters.

properties.name: billingStreet
properties.description: Street address for the billing address of this account

properties.name: customFieldsUi
properties.description: Filter by custom fields

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value to set on custom field

properties.name: description
properties.description: Text description of the account. Limited to 32,000 KB.

properties.name: fax
properties.description: Fax number for the account

properties.name: jigsaw
properties.description: References the ID of a company in Data.com

properties.name: industry
properties.description: The website of this account. Maximum of 255 characters.

properties.name: owner
properties.description: The owner of the account. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: parentId
properties.description: ID of the parent object, if any

properties.name: phone
properties.description: Phone number for the account

properties.name: recordTypeId
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: sicDesc
properties.description: A brief description of an organization’s line of business, based on its SIC code

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type of account. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: shippingCity
properties.description: Details of the shipping address for this account. City maximum size is 40 characters.

properties.name: shippingCountry
properties.description: Details of the shipping address for this account. Country maximum size is 80 characters.

properties.name: shippingPostalCode
properties.description: Details of the shipping address for this account. Postal code maximum size is 20 characters.

properties.name: shippingState
properties.description: Details of the shipping address for this account. State maximum size is 80 characters.

properties.name: shippingStreet
properties.description: The street address of the shipping address for this account. Maximum of 255 characters.

properties.name: website
properties.description: The website of this account. Maximum of 255 characters.

properties.name: accountId
properties.description: ID of account that needs to be fetched

properties.name: updateFields
properties.description: Account number assigned to this account (not the unique ID). Maximum size is 40 characters.

properties.name: ownerId
properties.description: The owner of the account. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: options
properties.description: Fields to include separated by ,

properties.name: conditionsUi
properties.description: The condition to set

properties.name: title
properties.description: Title of the note

properties.name: isPrivate
properties.description: Whether true, only the note owner or a user with the “Modify All Data” permission can view the note or query it via the API

properties.name: Create
properties.description: Create an account

properties.name: Create or Update
properties.description: Create a new account, or update the current one if it already exists (upsert)

properties.name: Delete
properties.description: Delete an account

properties.name: Get
properties.description: Get an account

properties.name: Get Many
properties.description: Get many accounts

properties.name: Get Summary
properties.description: Returns an overview of account's metadata

properties.name: Update
properties.description: Update an account

properties.name: attachmentId
properties.description: ID of attachment that needs to be fetched

properties.name: fields
properties.description: Fields to include separated by ,

properties.name: contactId
properties.description: ID of the associated Contact

properties.name: isEscalated
properties.description: Whether indicates whether the case has been escalated (true) or not

properties.name: origin
properties.description: The source of the case, such as Email, Phone, or Web. Label is Case Origin. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: ParentId
properties.description: The ID of the parent case in the hierarchy. The label is Parent Case.

properties.name: priority
properties.description: The importance or urgency of the case, such as High, Medium, or Low. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: reason
properties.description: The reason why the case was created, such as Instructions not clear, or User didn’t attend training. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: status
properties.description: The status of the case, such as “New,” “Closed,” or “Escalated.” This field directly controls the IsClosed flag. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: subject
properties.description: The subject of the case. Limit: 255 characters.

properties.name: suppliedCompany
properties.description: The company name that was entered when the case was created. This field can't be updated after the case has been created..

properties.name: suppliedEmail
properties.description: The email address that was entered when the case was created. This field can't be updated after the case has been created.

properties.name: suppliedName
properties.description: The name that was entered when the case was created. This field can't be updated after the case has been created.

properties.name: suppliedPhone
properties.description: The phone number that was entered when the case was created. This field can't be updated after the case has been created.

properties.name: caseId
properties.description: ID of case that needs to be fetched

properties.name: isPublished
properties.description: Whether the CaseComment is visible to customers in the Self-Service portal (true) or not (false)

properties.name: lastname
properties.description: Required. Last name of the contact. Limited to 80 characters.

properties.name: assistantName
properties.description: The name of the assistant

properties.name: Assistant Phone
properties.description: The telephone number of the assistant

properties.name: birthdate
properties.description: The birth date of the contact

properties.name: department
properties.description: The department of the contact

properties.name: email
properties.description: Email address for the contact

properties.name: otherPostalCode
properties.description: If bounce management is activated and an email sent to the contact bounces, the date and time the bounce occurred

properties.name: emailBouncedReason
properties.description: If bounce management is activated and an email sent to the contact bounces, the reason the bounce occurred

properties.name: firstName
properties.description: First name of the contact. Maximum size is 40 characters.

properties.name: homePhone
properties.description: Home telephone number for the contact

properties.name: leadSource
properties.description: Source from which the lead was obtained. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: mobilePhone
properties.description: Contact’s mobile phone number

properties.name: mailingStreet
properties.description: Street address for mailing address

properties.name: otherPhone
properties.description: Telephone for alternate address

properties.name: otherStreet
properties.description: Street for alternate address

properties.name: salutation
properties.description: Honorific abbreviation, word, or phrase to be used in front of name in greetings, such as Dr. or Mrs.

properties.name: emailBouncedDate
properties.description: If bounce management is activated and an email sent to the contact bounces, the date and time the bounce occurred

properties.name: lastName
properties.description: Last name of the contact. Limited to 80 characters.

properties.name: campaignId
properties.description: ID of the campaign that needs to be fetched. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: Add Note
properties.description: Add note to a contact

properties.name: customObject
properties.description: Name of the custom object. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: recordId
properties.description: Record ID to be updated

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: linkToObjectId
properties.description: ID of the object you want to link this document to

properties.name: jsonParameters
properties.description: Whether the input variables should be set via the value-key pair UI or JSON/RAW

properties.name: variablesJson
properties.description: Input variables as JSON object

properties.name: variablesUi
properties.description: The input variable to send

properties.name: Invoke
properties.description: Invoke a flow

properties.name: company
properties.description: Company of the lead. If person account record types have been enabled, and if the value of Company is null, the lead converts to a person account.

properties.name: city
properties.description: City for the address of the lead

properties.name: country
properties.description: Country of the lead

properties.name: firstname
properties.description: First name of the lead. Limited to 40 characters.

properties.name: hasOptedOutOfEmail
properties.description: Whether the lead doesn’t want to receive email from Salesforce (true) or does (false). Label is Email Opt Out.

properties.name: hasOptedOutOfFax
properties.description: Whether the lead doesn’t want to receive fax from Salesforce (true) or does (false). Label is Email Opt Out.

properties.name: IsUnreadByOwner
properties.description: Whether true, lead has been assigned, but not yet viewed. See Unread Leads for more information. Label is Unread By Owner.

properties.name: postalCode
properties.description: Postal code for the address of the lead. Label is Zip/Postal Code.

properties.name: rating
properties.description: Rating of the lead

properties.name: state
properties.description: State for the address of the lead

properties.name: street
properties.description: Street number and name for the address of the lead

properties.name: leadId
properties.description: ID of Lead that needs to be fetched

properties.name: HasOptedOutOfFax
properties.description: Whether the lead doesn’t want to receive fax from Salesforce (true) or does (false). Label is Fax Opt Out.

properties.name: closeDate
properties.description: Required. Date when the opportunity is expected to close.

properties.name: stageName
properties.description: Required. Date when the opportunity is expected to close. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Estimated total sale amount

properties.name: forecastCategoryName
properties.description: It is implied, but not directly controlled, by the StageName field

properties.name: nextStep
properties.description: Description of next task in closing opportunity. Limit: 255 characters.

properties.name: pricebook2Id
properties.description: ID of a related Pricebook2 object

properties.name: probability
properties.description: Percentage of estimated confidence in closing the opportunity

properties.name: opportunityId
properties.description: ID of opportunity that needs to be fetched

properties.name: query
properties.description: A SOQL query. An example query parameter string might look like: “SELECT+Name+FROM+MyObject”. If the SOQL query string is invalid, a MALFORMED_QUERY response is returned.

properties.name: callDisposition
properties.description: Represents the result of a given call, for example, “we'll call back,” or “call unsuccessful.” Limit is 255 characters. Not subject to field-level security, available for any user in an organization with Salesforce CRM Call Center.

properties.name: callDurationInSeconds
properties.description: Duration of the call in seconds. Not subject to field-level security, available for any user in an organization with Salesforce CRM Call Center.

properties.name: callObject
properties.description: Name of a call center. Limit is 255 characters. Not subject to field-level security, available for any user in an organization with Salesforce CRM Call Center.

properties.name: callType
properties.description: The type of call being answered: Inbound, Internal, or Outbound. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: isReminderSet
properties.description: Whether a popup reminder has been set for the task (true) or not (false)

properties.name: recurrenceType
properties.description: Recurrence Type of the task. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: recurrenceInstance
properties.description: The frequency of the recurring task. For example, “2nd” or “3rd.”. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: recurrenceInterval
properties.description: The interval between recurring tasks

properties.name: recurrenceDayOfMonth
properties.description: The day of the month in which the task repeats

properties.name: recurrenceDayOfWeekMask
properties.description: The day or days of the week on which the task repeats. This field contains a bitmask. The values are as follows: Sunday = 1 Monday = 2 Tuesday = 4 Wednesday = 8 Thursday = 16 Friday = 32 Saturday = 64 Multiple days are represented as the sum of their numerical values. For example, Tuesday and Thursday = 4 + 16 = 20.

properties.name: recurrenceEndDateOnly
properties.description: The last date on which the task repeats. This field has a timestamp that is always set to midnight in the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time zone.

properties.name: recurrenceTimeZoneSidKey
properties.description: The time zone associated with the recurring task. For example, “UTC-8:00” for Pacific Standard Time.

properties.name: reminderDateTime
properties.description: Represents the time when the reminder is scheduled to fire, if IsReminderSet is set to true. If IsReminderSet is set to false, then the user may have deselected the reminder checkbox in the Salesforce user interface, or the reminder has already fired at the time indicated by the value.

properties.name: whatId
properties.description: The WhatId represents nonhuman objects such as accounts, opportunities, campaigns, cases, or custom objects. WhatIds are polymorphic. Polymorphic means a WhatId is equivalent to the ID of a related object.

properties.name: whoId
properties.description: The WhoId represents a human such as a lead or a contact. WhoIds are polymorphic. Polymorphic means a WhoId is equivalent to a contact’s ID or a lead’s ID.

properties.name: taskId
properties.description: ID of task that needs to be fetched

properties.name: userId
properties.description: ID of user that needs to be fetched

properties.name: resource
properties.description: Represents an individual account, which is an organization or person involved with your business (such as customers, competitors, and partners)

properties.name: Attachment
properties.description: Represents a file that a has uploaded and attached to a parent object

properties.name: Case
properties.description: Represents a case, which is a customer issue or problem

properties.name: Contact
properties.description: Represents a contact, which is an individual associated with an account

properties.name: Custom Object
properties.description: Represents a custom object

properties.name: Document
properties.description: Represents a document

properties.name: Flow
properties.description: Represents an autolaunched flow

properties.name: Lead
properties.description: Represents a prospect or potential

properties.name: Opportunity
properties.description: Represents an opportunity, which is a sale or pending deal

properties.name: Search
properties.description: Search records

properties.name: Task
properties.description: Represents a business activity such as making a phone call or other to-do items. In the user interface, and records are collectively referred to as activities.

properties.name: User
properties.description: Represents a person, which is one user in system
